chapter.text: Em
Asq
Akka i Iweeea i kecc, akked wid ik id izwaren, Oebbi, Uzmir, Bab n uuwab
IneS i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Neppa, d Aalayen, d Ameqwoahan
Qoib ad ccergen igenwan seg ixfawen nnsen, mara d lhint lmalayek deg usbuccaa s ccekoan n Mass nnsent, u ssuturent ad pwassemeen kra illan di tmurt. War ccekk, Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Wid irran imawlan, war Neppa, Iquoaa ten Oebbi. Ur telliv, kecc, d awkil nnsen
Akka ay k n Nweeea Leqwoan, s taaoabt, iwakken a pnedoev tayimmap n temdinin, akked wayen i s d izzin; a pnedoev af ass n temlilit, ur degs ccekk; arbaa di Loennet, arbaa deg ujajie
Lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, yili Izdukkel iten d yiwen n lois. Maca, ad Issekcem win i S ihwan ar ueunu S. Imednas, ur sain bab ne$ asettao
Ne$ rran imawlan, war Neppa. Oebbi d Neppa ay d Bab, d Neppa i Issidiren lmeggtin, d Neppa i Izemren i yal cci
Ayen akw i$ef temgarradem, aeuddu s ar Oebbi. Akka Oebbi, Mass iw; fellaS ppekle$, $eo Neppa ay steooiae
Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan. Seg iman nnwen Irra yawen tiyugiwin; si lmal nnwen, tiyugiwin. Isfukti kwen yisent. Ur illi wayen i T icban. Neppa Issel, Ipwali
IneS tisura n tmurt akked igenwan. Issugut ooeeq i win i S ihwan, Iwezzen. Ih, Neppa Issen yal cci

Issers awen d, di ddin, ayen i$ef Iweuua Nue. Ayen i k Nweeea, d ayen i$ef Nweuua Iboahim, Musa, akked Aisa: "sbeddet ddin, ur ppemgarradet fellas". eEEeay, i imcurak, wayen u$uo la ten tneccdev. Oebbi Ippawi $uoeS, win i S ihwan; Inehhu $uoeS, win isteooiaen
Ur mfaoaqen armi ten id tusa tussna. Ppemvuddun. Lemmer ur d izwar wawal s$uo Mass ik $ef lmijal ipwassnen, yili myefran. Ih, wid iweoten Tazmamt deffir sen, haaten, fellas, di ccekk imcebbwel

Ilmend n waya, enced, ssewqem akken i tepwamoev, ur teddu d cchawi nnsen. Ini: "umne$ s wayen id Issader Oebbi n Tira. Pwamoe$ d ad wezne$ garawen. Oebbi d Mass nne$, u d Mass nnwen. I nekwni igiten nne$, i kunwi igiten nnwen. Ur teppili nnmara garane$. Oebbi ad a$ Issemlil. Tu$alin $uoeS
Wid ipnamaren af Oebbi, deffir wagwav n loawab $uosen, ur teswi nnmara nnsen, ar Mass nnsen. Fellasen zzaaf, fellasen aaaqeb uqsie
Oebbi id Issadren Tazmamt, s tidep, akked lmizan. W ad ak imlen, ahat imir iqeob ed
Earen $uoes wid ur numin ara yis. Ma d wid iumnen, ugaden t; eoan ar neppa d tidep. Ih, wid icukken deg imir, haaten, war ccekk, di ttelfan u$miq
Oebbi d Laiif i imdanen iS. Ip$iti win i S ihwan. Neppa d Uohid, d Uzmir
Win ib$an tayerza n laxeot, ad as Nernu di tyerza ines. Win ib$an tayerza n ddunit, ad as Nefk segs. Ur as illi umur di laxeot
Ne$ saan icriken, sse$oen ten di ddin ur Iqbil Oebbi? Lemmer ur d izwir ara wawal n ufraz, a p fru garasen. I imednas, war ccekk, aaaqeb aqeoean

A pwaliv imednas feqaen ilmend n wayen kesben, u neppa iddehm ed fellasen. Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ad ilin di tebeirin n leonanat. Nnsen i sen ihwan $uo Mass nnsen. D wagi ay d lfevl ameqwoan

D wagi is Ipbeccio Oebbi imdanen iS, wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan. Ini: "ur awen ssutre$ taqdiat, af waya, siwa lmaenana i llezm nnwen". Win ixedmen ise$, ad as Nernu degs lehhu. Oebbi, ih, Ipsemmie, Ippara tajmilt
Ne$ a d inin: "isnulfa d tikerkas af Oebbi". Ma ihwa yaS i Oebbi, ad Icemmaa ul ik. S wawal iS, ad Isqucc Oebbi tikerkas, ad Ieeqqeq tidep. Ih, Neppa Ieoa tababnit n idmaren
D Neppa i Iqeblen nndama n yimdanen iS. Ipsemmie tucmitin. Issen ayen txeddmem
Issemeas i wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan. Ad asen Irnu si lfevl iS. I ijehliyen, aaaqeb uqsie
Ma Issuget Oebbi l$it i imdanen iS, ad be$wven di tmurt. Maca, Issrusu d, s lmizan, ayen i S ihwan. Ih, Neppa Ippuxebbeo $ef imdanen iS, Ipwali ten
D Neppa id Isse$layen ageffur mara aysen. Iweppaa aeunu S. Neppa d Bab, d Amaazuz
Seg issekniyen iS, lxelq n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan n leweuc, degsen. Izmer Neppa, ma ihwa yaS, a ten id Issemlil
Kra n tiyta ikwen iwwten, siwa ayen d bbwin ifassen nnwen. Aias i Ipsemmie
Ur tezmirem a ppesfunngem di tmurt. Ur awen illi, war Oebbi, bab ne$ asettao
Seg issekniyen iS, ssfinat di yill, amzun d idurar
Ma ihwa yaS ad Issens avu, ad eebsent, d tusbivin sufella s. War ccekk, ayagi d issekniyen i yal aueboi isnemmiren
Ne$ a ten Issenger ilmend n wayen kesben. Aias i Ipsemmie
Ad eoen wid ipnamaren $ef issekniyen nne£, ar ur asen illi ssoan
Ayen akw i wen ippunefken n wayla, d zzhu n tmeddurt di ddunit. Ayen illan ar Oebbi, yif it; ad idum kteo, i wid iumnen, ippeklen $ef Mass nnsen
wid ijunben ibekkaven ibararen, akked laao, u ssurufen i wid i ten isserfan
wid id ipjawaben i Mass nnsen, peallan, ppemcawaoen $ef lameo nnsen, pseddiqen seg wayen iten N$at
wid, ma iusa ten lbe$wv, ad qablen
Aqeiii n tucmip, d tucmip i p icban. Win isemmeen, issweqmen, arraz is ar Oebbi. Neppa, ih, ur Ieemmel ara imednas
Ma d wid id irran ppao mi pwadensen, ur telli tiyta degsen
Tiyta, kan, deg wid ivuooen imdanen, iqehoen di tmurt, war ssebba. I wigi, aaaqeb aqeoean
Ma d win iueboen, isemmeen, ayagi, s tidep, d aseyyi n lumuo
Win Itlef Oebbi, ur isai bab, deffir eS. A pwaliv imednas, mara eoen aaaqeb, ad inin: "ma illa ubrid n tu$alin

A ten twaliv pwafessren fellas, ndellen, ggaren tii s tugwdi. Ad inin wid iumnen: "imexsuoen, s tidep, d wid i sxesoen iman nnsen, akked twacult nnsen, ass n tnekra". War ccekk, deg uaaqeb imezgi, ara yilin imednas
Ur asen llin imawlan, ara ten isellken, war Oebbi. Win Itlef Oebbi, ur isai abrid
Jawbet i Mass nnwen, uqbel a d ias, s$uo Oebbi, ass ur nepwexxio. Ur awen ippili ssoan assen, ur tezmirem a pnekoem
Ma numren, ur k id Nuzen ara d ameareb nnsen. Ay fellak, siwa timenna. Ih, mara Neseess i umdan aeunu s$uone£, ad ifoee yis. Mara t tsami tucmip, id bbwin ifassen is, s tidep, amdan ad ikaraa
N Oebbi, tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Ixelleq ayen i S ihwan. Ippak nnta i win i S ihwan, Ippak ddkeo i win i S ihwan
Ne$ Ipcarak ddkeo d nnta. Isaaqao win i S ihwan. Ih, Neppa Issen, Izmer
Ur ippunefk ara i umdan, ad as Immeslay Oebbi, siwa aweeei, ne$ deffir ucembir, ne$ a d iazen amazan iwumi ara Iweeei, s tsrie iS, ayen Ib$a. Ih, Neppa d Aalayen, d Bab n uuwab
Akka ik d Nweeea ooue, si lameo nne£; ur telliv d win issnen d acu p Tezmamt, ne$ liman. Maca, nerra p d tafat. Yis Nenehhu win i £ ihwan, seg imdanen nne£. Ih, d Kecc i ippawin d ubrid uwqim
abrid n Oebbi, i Isaan i illan di tmurt, i illan deg igenwan. War ccekk, ar Oebbi ay teddun lumuo
